comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0

If there is a confirmation box during form submission, i can bypass the confirmation box by refreshing the page which leads to submission of the form.



Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. sample html code to reproduce the bug is attached.
2. open the file in the browser. click on submit-me button.
3. When the confirmation dialog is shown. REFRESH the page.



Actual Results:  
The form posts even if not intended. and redirects to the action page.

Expected Results:  
1.Should not allow page refresh when there is a confirm dialog
2. Even if allowed it should terminate the form submission.
